text: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. I saw this as well. It actually popped up the search box and at the top there was a prompt asking me if I wanted to “keep this on.” No, I don’t. I’ve had it off for years. You shouldn’t have turned it back on in the first place.

metadata.topic: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.

It actually popped up the search box and at the top there was a prompt asking me if I wanted to “keep this on.” No, I don’t. I’ve had it off for years. You shouldn’t have turned it back on in the first place.
